definition: to contain/to hold/(of a person or style etc) reserved/restrained/(of words, writings) full of hidden meaning/implicit/veiled (criticism)
to keep/to contain/to suck (keep in your mouth without chewing)
to store up/to grow (e.g. a beard)/to entertain (ideas)

sentences.english: Implicitly, the UK government is guaranteeing the liabilities of the swollen UK banks.
sentences.chinese: 含蓄地說，英國政府在爲英國銀行庸腫的債務作保。

sentences.english: Structural semantics deals with implicational lexical relations.
sentences.chinese: 結構語義學研究含蓄的語義關係。

sentences.english: However, the published material is being distributed without warranty of any kind, either express of implied.
sentences.chinese: 但是，已出版材料的分發無任何明確或含蓄的保證。

sentences.english: The final implied effusion is like a last judgment.
sentences.chinese: 最後含蓄的表露像是最後判決。

sentences.english: All sorts of article and multiform emersion " contracted reservation " .
sentences.chinese: 各種物品和各種形式都再現“簡約含蓄”。

sentences.english: A mind at peace with all below.
sentences.chinese: 那心靈安詳而含蓄蘊藉。

sentences.english: “Good. Now move onto the second thing, ” she cryptically says.
sentences.chinese: “好，現在進行第二件事，”她含蓄地指示他們。

sentences.english: The auspicious friend draws like the person, implicit humour is easy and intelligent without seemingly so.
sentences.chinese: 瑞友畫如其人，含蓄幽默，平易而內秀。

sentences.english: The strong and subtle symbol of the flared cross is a powerful way to express your faith.
sentences.chinese: 含蓄的鐘形十字符號是展現您堅定信仰最好的方法。

sentences.english: All manner of implied communications go unnoticed, she said.
sentences.chinese: 她說自己沒法注意到任何含蓄的溝通。

sentences.english: I agree with the underlying sentiment expressed by Slattery.
sentences.chinese: 我贊同Slattery在觀點上的含蓄表達。

sentences.english: There are more obscure poems written and printed every year than clear ones.
sentences.chinese: 每年創作和發表的詩篇，含蓄不露的比明朗的多。

sentences.english: He is a man of undemonstrative nature.
sentences.chinese: 他是個性情含蓄的男子。

sentences.english: Very subtly I tried to feel him out.
sentences.chinese: 我試圖很含蓄地找出他的動力根源。

sentences.english: Was it a coded signal about policy?
sentences.chinese: 這是有關政策的一個含蓄信號嗎？

sentences.english: Time, such as smoke, unpredictable, wonderful subtle.
sentences.chinese: 時如煙雲，變幻莫測，奇妙含蓄。

definition: deep/profound/(of a person) reserved/undemonstrative/(of a voice, sound etc) deep/low-pitched
